verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Speak <S%H559><s%> unto the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2930><s%>, There shall none defile himself for the dead <S%H5315><s%> among his people <S%H5971><s%>;

except for his kin <S%H7607><s%>, that is near <S%H7138><s%> unto him <S%H517><s%>, for his mother, and for his father <S%H1><s%>, and for his son <S%H1121><s%>, and for his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and for his brother <S%H251><s%>,
and for his sister <S%H269><s%> a virgin <S%H1330><s%>, that is near <S%H7138><s%> unto him <S%H376><s%>, that hath had no husband; for her may he defile himself <S%H2930><s%>.
He shall not defile <S%H2930><s%> himself <S%H1167><s%>, being a chief man among his people <S%H5971><s%>, to profane himself <S%H2490><s%>.

They shall not make <S%H7139><s%> baldness <S%H7144><s%> upon their head <S%H7218><s%>, neither shall they shave off <S%H1548><s%> the corner <S%H6285><s%> of their beard <S%H2206><s%>, nor make <S%H8295><s%> any cuttings <S%H8296><s%> in their flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

They shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> unto their God <S%H430><s%>, and not profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their God <S%H430><s%>; for the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, the bread <S%H3899><s%> of their God <S%H430><s%>, they do offer <S%H7126><s%>: therefore they shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>.

They shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> that is a harlot <S%H2181><s%>, or profane <S%H2491><s%>; neither shall they take <S%H3947><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> put away <S%H1644><s%> from her husband <S%H376><s%>: for he is holy <S%H6918><s%> unto his God <S%H430><s%>.

Thou shalt sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him therefore <S%H7126><s%>; for he offereth the bread <S%H3899><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%>: he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>: for I Jehovah, who sanctify <S%H6942><s%> you <S%H6918><s%>, am holy.

And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of any <S%H376><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, if she profane <S%H2490><s%> herself by playing the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, she profaneth <S%H2490><s%> her father <S%H1><s%>: she shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And he that is the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> among his brethren <S%H251><s%>, upon whose head <S%H7218><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> is poured <S%H3332><s%>, and that is consecrated <S%H4390><s%> to put <S%H3847><s%> on the garments <S%H899><s%>, shall not let the hair of his head <S%H7218><s%> go loose <S%H6544><s%>, nor rend <S%H6533><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>;
neither shall he go in <S%H935><s%> to any dead <S%H4191><s%> body <S%H5315><s%>, nor defile <S%H2930><s%> himself for his father <S%H1><s%>, or for his mother <S%H517><s%>;

neither shall he go out <S%H3318><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, nor profane <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%>; for the crown <S%H5145><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is upon him <S%H3068><s%>: I am Jehovah.
And he shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> in her virginity <S%H1331><s%>.

A widow <S%H490><s%>, or one divorced <S%H2491><s%>, or a profane woman <S%H1644><s%>, a harlot <S%H2181><s%>, these shall he not take <S%H3947><s%>: but a virgin <S%H1330><s%> of his own people <S%H5971><s%> shall he take <S%H3947><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>.
And he shall not profane <S%H2490><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%> among his people <S%H5971><s%>: for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifieth him <S%H6942><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Whosoever <S%H376><s%> he be of thy seed <S%H2233><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%> that hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>, let him not approach <S%H7126><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%>.

For whatsoever man <S%H376><s%> he be that hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>, he shall not approach <S%H7126><s%>: a blind <S%H5787><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, or a lame <S%H6455><s%>, or he that hath a flat nose <S%H2763><s%>, or anything superfluous <S%H8311><s%>,
or a man <S%H376><s%> that is broken-footed <S%H7667><s%>, or broken-handed <S%H7667><s%>,

or crook-backed <S%H1384><s%>, or a dwarf <S%H1851><s%>, or that hath a blemish <S%H8400><s%> in his eye <S%H5869><s%>, or is scurvy <S%H1618><s%>, or scabbed <S%H3217><s%>, or hath his stones <S%H810><s%> broken <S%H4790><s%>;

no man <S%H376><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, that hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>, shall come nigh <S%H5066><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>: he hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>; he shall not come nigh <S%H5066><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%>.
He shall eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%>, both of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>, and of the holy <S%H6944><s%>:

only he shall not go in <S%H935><s%> unto the veil <S%H6532><s%>, nor come nigh <S%H5066><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, because he hath a blemish <S%H3971><s%>; that he profane <S%H2490><s%> not my sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%>: for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> who sanctifieth them <S%H6942><s%>.
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
